description: "Based on surveys by Sir Stamford Raffles, this German map of Sumatra focuses on the navigation of coasts and straits, with bathymetry (sea depth), anchor points, shoals and reefs marked, including on inset maps of Singapore and the Bangka Strait."
title: "Karte von der Insel Sumatra ... Berghaus. Gest. v. W. Jättnig. [Insets] Lacca Diven, Male Diven, Tschagos Archipelag, Keeling od. Borneo Korallen Insel, Insel Singapore, Bangka Strasse. Sheet 11 of Berghaus' Atlas von Asia [cartographic material]."
